message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer Alice! I appreciate you being willing to sell it to me. While I'm interested, $120 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $105 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your honesty about your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $115. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
